price: 69. Y tu Señor conoce lo que esconden los corazones y lo que manifiestan.
arabic: وَرَبُّكَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمۡ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: warabbuka yaʿlamu mā tukinnu ṣudūruhum wamā yuʿ'linūna
